CustomField.formula: IF (NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"Import")), IF(OR($User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4d', $User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4t', $User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4u'), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__LightningSelectTemplate?id=" &Id & "&action=Generate_Supporting_Document&templateType=Supporting_Document", IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_GenerateSupportingDocument", "Generate Supporting Document"),"_self"), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__SelectTemplate?id=" &Id & "&action=Generate_Supporting_Document&templateType=Supporting_Document", IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_GenerateSupportingDocument", "Generate Supporting Document"),"_self")), NULL)
CustomField.label: Generate Supporting Document
